          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Setting Typeface and Margins</string>
            <string language="en">Setting Typeface wild duck Margins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einstellung der wilden Seitenränder Ente des 
Schriftbildes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réglage des marges sauvages de canard d'oeil d'un 
caractère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajustando margens selvagens do pato do typeface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regolazione dei margini selvaggi dell'anatra di 
occhio dei caratteri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέτοντας στο χαρακτήρα τα άγρια περιθώρια παπιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fijar márgenes salvajes del pato de la 
tipografía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">The letters you write have several important characteristics. One of them is size. Size is measured in points.Modul 3 - Writing.Ingår i Engelska B - CFL.</string>
            <string language="en">The Lettishes' you write have several important characteristics. One of H afternoon ice size. Size ice measured in points.

Module 3 - Writing.

Is included in English B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Engelska B</string>
            <string language="sv">engelska</string>
            <string language="sv">English B</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>

            <string language="en">setting margins</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Des Lettishes' Sie schreiben haben einige wichtige 
Eigenschaften. Ein der H Nachmittag Eisgröße. Sortieren 
Sie das Eis, das in points.Module 3 gemessen wird - Writing.Is 
eingeschlossen in englischem B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous du Lettishes écrivez avez plusieurs 
caractéristiques importantes. Un de la taille de glace 
d'après-midi de H. Classez la glace mesurée dans points.Module
3 - Writing.Is inclus dans B anglais - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você do Lettishes' escreve tem diversas 
características importantes. Um do tamanho do gelo da tarde de 
H. Faça sob medida o gelo medido em points.Module 3 - 
Writing.Is incluído em B inglês - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Del Lettishes scrivete avete parecchie 
caratteristiche importanti. Uno del formato del ghiaccio di 
pomeriggio di H. Gradui il ghiaccio secondo la misura misurato 
in points.Module 3 - Writing.Is incluso in B inglese - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Lettishes εσείς γράφει έχει διάφορα σημαντικά 
χαρακτηριστικά. Ένα από το μέγεθος πάγου απογεύματος χ. 
Πάγος μεγέθους που μετριέται στην ενότητα 3 σημείων - που 
γράφει συμπεριλαμβάνεται στο αγγλικό β - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted del Lettishes escribe tiene varias 
características importantes. Uno de la talla del hielo de la 
tarde de H. Clasifique el hielo medido en points.Module 3 - 
Writing.Is incluido en B inglés - CFL.</string>
          </description>
